author: Vertyco
description: Lock command or cog usage to specific channels and redirect users to the correct ones.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store data about end users.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing! run `[p]commandlock` to get started.

This cog is a derivative work inspired by the ChannelRedirect cog by [SinbadCogs](https://github.com/mikeshardmind/SinbadCogs)
short: Lock command or cog usage to specific channels.
